abstract.text: Construct and manage a graphical, event-driven user interface for your macOS app.
A mechanism for displaying text or images in a view object without the overhead of a full
The display characteristics and identifier for a column in a table view.
Returns the cell object used to display values in the specified row of the table column.
A set of related records, displayed in rows that represent individual records and columns that represent the attributes of those records.
A set of optional methods you implement in a table view delegate to customize the behavior of the table view.
Asks the delegate for a custom data cell for the specified row and column.
Asks the delegate if an expansion tooltip should be displayed for a specific row and column.
Asks the delegate for a string to display in a tooltip for the specified cell in the column and row.
Tells the delegate that the table view will display the specified cell at the specified row and column.
The infrastructure for drawing, printing, and handling events in an app.
A singleton actor whose executor is equivalent to the main dispatch queue.
